TermDefinition.DefinitionText: An uncommon type of thyroid tumor that can be benign or malignant.

MediaLink.alt: Pronunciation of dictionary term "Hurthle cell neoplasm"
Pronunciation of dictionary term "neoplasma de células de Hurthle"

SpanishTermDefinition.DefinitionText: Tipo poco frecuente de tumor tiroideo que puede ser benigno o maligno.
